page.description: Example demonstrates an iOS-style login screen with round buttons and validation.

section.description: The iOS Style Login Screen example is loaded by clicking the Load Sample ViewBox link on the Home tab of the ViewBox Builder.
To learn more, watch the videos below. In these videos we do a behind-the-scenes walk-through of the sample 'iOS Login' ViewBox Control.
